languages.text: {n}Вы пытаетесь следить за махинациями Джай, но... Погодите! Вам кажется, или эту фигуру вы забираете уже третий раз? Или это троится у вас в глазах? И почему Джай победно хлопает в ладоши?{/n}
{n}You try to keep watch for Jae's tricks, but... Wait! Is this the third time you've taken this piece? Or are you seeing triple? And why is Jae clapping as though she has won?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь следить за махинациями Джай, но... Погодите! Вам кажется, или эту фигуру вы забираете уже третий раз? Или это троится у вас в глазах? И почему Джай победно хлопает в ладоши?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You try to keep track of Jae's shenanigans, but... Wait! Are you capturing this piece for the third time now? Or are you seeing triple? And why is Jae clapping as if she has won?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous ouvrez l'œil pour tenter de repérer les ruses que Jae pourrait employer, mais... Une minute ! Est-ce la troisième fois que vous prenez cette pièce ? Ou voyez-vous triple ? Et pourquoi Jae bat-elle des mains comme si elle avait gagné ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to keep watch for Jae's tricks, but... Wait! Is this the third time you've taken this piece? Or are you seeing triple? And why is Jae clapping as though she has won?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous ouvrez l'œil pour tenter de repérer les ruses que Jae pourrait employer, mais... Une minute ! Est-ce la troisième fois que vous prenez cette pièce ? Ou voyez-vous triple ? Et pourquoi Jae bat-elle des mains comme si elle avait gagné ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentas vigilar a Jae para que no haga ninguno de sus trucos, pero... ¡Espera! ¿Es la tercera vez que capturas esa pieza o es que estás viendo triple? ¿Y por qué aplaude Jae como si hubiera ganado?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to keep watch for Jae's tricks, but... Wait! Is this the third time you've taken this piece? Or are you seeing triple? And why is Jae clapping as though she has won?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas vigilar a Jae para que no haga ninguno de sus trucos, pero... ¡Espera! ¿Es la tercera vez que capturas esa pieza o es que estás viendo triple? ¿Y por qué aplaude Jae como si hubiera ganado?{/n}

languages.text: {n}你试着留意婕伊的小动作，不过……等等！这枚棋子你是不是已经吃过三次了？还是说，它看起来已经重影了？婕伊怎么已经开始鼓掌庆祝胜利了？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to keep watch for Jae's tricks, but... Wait! Is this the third time you've taken this piece? Or are you seeing triple? And why is Jae clapping as though she has won?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你试着留意婕伊的小动作，不过……等等！这枚棋子你是不是已经吃过三次了？还是说，它看起来已经重影了？婕伊怎么已经开始鼓掌庆祝胜利了？{/n}

languages.text: {n}ジェイのトリックを監視しようとしたが…待った！このピースを取るのは3回目？それとも3回目？そして、なぜジェイは勝ったかのように拍手をしているのだ？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to keep watch for Jae's tricks, but... Wait! Is this the third time you've taken this piece? Or are you seeing triple? And why is Jae clapping as though she has won?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイのトリックを監視しようとしたが…待った！このピースを取るのは3回目？それとも3回目？そして、なぜジェイは勝ったかのように拍手をしているのだ？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du versuchst, auf Jaes Tricks zu achten, aber ... Augenblick! Hast du diese Figur jetzt nicht schon zum dritten Mal geschlagen? Oder siehst du etwa dreifach? Und warum klatscht Jae, als hätte sie gewonnen?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to keep watch for Jae's tricks, but... Wait! Is this the third time you've taken this piece? Or are you seeing triple? And why is Jae clapping as though she has won?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du versuchst, auf Jaes Tricks zu achten, aber ... Augenblick! Hast du diese Figur jetzt nicht schon zum dritten Mal geschlagen? Oder siehst du etwa dreifach? Und warum klatscht Jae, als hätte sie gewonnen?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın numaralarını takip etmeye çalışıyorsun ama... Bir dakika! Bu taşı üçüncü kez mi aldın az önce? Yoksa üçerli mi görüyorsun artık? Jae neden kazanmış gibi el çırpıyor?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to keep watch for Jae's tricks, but... Wait! Is this the third time you've taken this piece? Or are you seeing triple? And why is Jae clapping as though she has won?{/n}
